column4: Diva Chics Be Fabulous Moisture Rich Shampoo - Imported

Diva Chics Be Fabulous Moisture Rich Shampoo - Imported (1000 ml) Price: Rs.3900

Diva Chics Be Fabulous Moisture Rich Shampoo 33. 8 fl oz (1 liter). Your hair deserves to Be Fabulous. It s stressed out overworked and it needs a quot girls night out. quot Our luxurious shampoo blends rich lather a delicious tropical fragrance and adds just the right amount of moisture to restore healthy condition and shine. A potent blend of vitamins and our own Exotic Superfruit Complex trade Acai Pomegranate amp Dragonberry Extracts helps provide strong antioxidant protection against environmental stress and revitalizes dull dry hair. We ve also whipped in a little sunflower seed extract to help reduce color fading. Be Fabulous and show off your happy healthy hair. Professional Salon formula.
